main.name: Carlos Robles
main.description: Python,Java and React based web projects

resume.skillmessage: Fullstack Engineer with knowledge in python,java, vanilla JS and React JS. Also i have implemented many algorithms to improve memory management.

education.description: During school i aquired leadership and management skills such as creating innovating projects. With the help of other classmates, i created a forecast device with raspberry Pi alongside with a web system to prevent flooding.
During my internship i took several computer science workshops about data science and advanced software engineering

work.title: Java Fullstack Developer
work.description: I worked as a fullstack java and javascript developer during my college years. I was working on my thesis project, a bullyng prevention system using graph theory and the js library networkx. I worked on another non-school related projects, such as Deja-Bus (An app that allows you to know in which time your bus arrives). I worked on the fronted of Dejabus and also proposed ideas for the app logo. I worked on devops giving support to linux servers and working with jenkins pipelines.

work.title: Front-end Developer
work.description: Worked on an agile team of 4 developers. I was in charge of the front-end development of HPE's server vending webpage. I worked on the data layer of the web page in order to ensure analytics and tealium tags were working fine.Tools used: Jenkins, React, VanillaJS, Docker, Python, Charles, Tealium, Google Analytics

work.title: Senior Java Fullstack Dev
work.description: Worked alongside 6 developers in a healthcare web based system that used HADOOP, Java and angular. I developed modules in java for the data manipulation of the hospital revenue. I worked on the hadoop environment in order to create nodes for the system. I proposed the use of the library ElasticSearch for searching a patient more easily.

projects.title: Bengalapp
projects.category: React Native based app that recommends safest routes to school or work and maps dangerous areas in your city

projects.title: Bus Routes simulation
projects.category: A python made simulation to represent routes in my city

projects.title: React based Pokedex
projects.category: Pokedex i build using the poke-api and React JS. It includes an interactive GUI.

projects.title: Tlaloc: A weather forecast web system

testimonials.text: Carlos has an energetic spirit. His data and programming skills make him a good asset for any company or project
testimonials.user: José Cortés - Senior Project Manager at Hewlett Packard Enterprise

testimonials.text: Carlos is a very human person, he helps others with their programming issues. He is very efficient and is always innovating
testimonials.user: Luís Garcia - Senior Java Developer at UST GLOBAL
